en: God standeth in the congregation of God; He judgeth among the gods.
hmr: Pathien chu Pathien inkhâwmna siema chun a ngîr a; Pathienhai lai chun ro a rêl a.

en: How long will ye judge unjustly, And respect the persons of the wicked? [Selah
hmr: Ieng chen am indik nawtaka ro in rêl a, Mi rilohai chu in ditsak bîk ding a na?

en: Judge the poor and fatherless: Do justice to the afflicted and destitute.
hmr: Rimsihai le pa nei nawhai ro chu rêl unla, Rinum tuorhai le pasiehai chunga chun sukdik ro.

en: Rescue the poor and needy: Deliver them out of the hand of the wicked.
hmr: Rimsihai le pasiehai chu san unla, Mi rilo kuta inthawk chun sanhim ro.

en: They know not, neither do they understand; They walk to and fro in darkness: All the foundations of the earth are shaken.
hmr: An hriet nawh a, hrietthiemna an nei bawk nawh; In thima chun an inlawn an inlawn a; Leihnuoi innghatna po po chu ân hnîng ta vawng a.

en: I said, Ye are gods, And all of you sons of the Most High.
hmr: “Pathienhai in na, In rêngin Achunghnungtak nauhai in nih,” ka ti kha.

en: Nevertheless ye shall die like men, And fall like one of the princes.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, mihriemhai ang elin la thîng in ta, Mi lien pakhat ang khan la tlûng in tih.

en: Arise, O God, judge the earth; For thou shalt inherit all the nations.
hmr: Aw Pathien, tho la, hnuoi chung ro hi rêl rawh, Hnam tinrêng hi i la lâkkhâwm ding a ni sih a.
